title: Combustion Air Duct
description: Combustion Air Duct supplying air to the burners above from blowers underneath the floor in the basement. Efficient combustion requires three items: heat, fuel, and air. For efficient combustion and safety precautions it is necessary to provide boilers with an appropriate fresh air supply. If combustion air supply is limited the fire starts to smoke, incomplete combustion occur and carbon monoxide is generated.
